title: 233: CHATTY BROS: Bachelor Hometowns & WTA Recap!
itunes:title: 233: CHATTY BROS: Bachelor Hometowns & WTA Recap!
description:
Evan And Grayston are back to recap Matt's Hometowns and WTA episodes! First they briefly chat Chris Harrison’s latest interview with Michael Strahan on GMA. Then they dive into their thoughts on each Hometown date, opinions on Michelle’s biking date, theories on Rachel’s skydiving instructor, the Women Tell All, which one of them loves PDA and which one does not, thoughts on a future Bachelorette, Matt’s beard and responses, and much more!

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/


FOLLOW CHATTY

BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
